room_title: Escape room "Old Man Jones's Shop" by Bluff City Escape Rooms in Memphis
review: Every time we have been here it has ended our night amazing whether we got out or not! The fact that this place is family owned by genuinely nice and fun people makes it that much more fun and enjoyable and keeps us coming back! Old man Jones's shop- stumped us but was a challenge to the extreme and fun to really test your thinking and we still enjoyed failing that room haha. we were so close with only 2 of us in it. Very cool room.
